titles.title: Medicare Rural Community Hospital Demonstration Project Expansion Act of 2004
A bill to expand the medicare rural community hospital demonstration program to include outpatient services.
Medicare Rural Community Hospital Demonstration Project Expansion Act of 2004

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Medicare Rural Community Hospital Demonstration Project Expansion Act of 2004 - Amends the Medicare Prescription Drug, Improvement, and Modernization Act of 2003 to expand the Medicare rural community hospital demonstration program to include covered outpatient hospital services.
